---
title: "AEP2 -- Area of Quad"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
area <- read_csv("data/area.csv")

area
```

Make a histogram

```{r}
area |>
  ggplot( aes(x = area)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=20, col="white")

area |>
  summarize(mean = mean(area, na.rm = TRUE), 
            median = median(area, na.rm = TRUE),
            stdev = sd(area, na.rm = TRUE))
```




```{r}
area |>
  ggplot( aes(x = area)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
